statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE material_type = 'Metal'
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity >= 100 AND unit_price > 10
SELECT material_id, material_name, unit_price FROM inventory ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC, unit_price DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity FROM inventory WHERE material_type = 'metal' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE material_type IS NULL OR quantity < 50 ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY material_name HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY item_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT item_name, location, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Store%' ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' AND transaction_date >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM suppliers;
SELECT order_id, item_name, quantity FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.item_id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT supplier_name, item_name, quantity, order_date FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id JOIN inventory ON orders.item_id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.item_id = inventory.item_id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE orders.quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PrintMaterialsInventory;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM PrintMaterialsInventory WHERE material_type = 'Paper';
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM MaterialSuppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaterialTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM MaterialLocations WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM PrintMaterialsInventory WHERE material_type = 'Paper' ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM MaterialSuppliers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM PrintMaterialsInventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaterialTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM MaterialLocations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'raw';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT sale_id, customer_name, sale_date FROM sales JOIN customers ON sales.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_type='Metal' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity, location FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100 AND location='Warehouse';
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, orders.order_date, orders.price FROM suppliers INNER JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id WHERE suppliers.contact_person LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customers.customer_name, sales.sale_date FROM customers INNER JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id ORDER BY sales.sale_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity, location FROM materials WHERE quantity < 50 AND location='Storage' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
